title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may be fascinated by the creative process, going out of your way to watch people make art today. Perhaps youre mesmerized by a street performer or captivated by an artist's how-to videos online. Whatever distraction you choose, there is a deeper dynamic at work. Your current behavior could be motivated by your hidden desire to express whats in your heart. Observing someone else inspires your wishful fantasy to be appreciated for your childlike ingenuity. George Bernard Shaw wrote, We dont stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
